REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1259 reute u f BC-DAYTON-HUDSON-<DH>-MA 04-09 0070

TEXT.TITLE: DAYTON HUDSON <DH> MARCH SALES OFF 4.9 PCT
TEXT.BODY: Dayton Hudson Corp said retail sales for the five weeks ended April Four were 791.8 mln dlrs compared to 755.6 mln dlrs a year ago. On a comparable store basis, it said sales declined 4.9 pct. Sales for the nine months were 1.39 billion dlrs, up from 1.26 billion dlrs in the same 1986 period. On a comparable store basis, the sales rose 1.2 pct. Reuter
